items.title: O'Connor signs contract extension with Leeds

items.title: Guardiola apologises to ref Hallam but 'defends' outburst
items.snippet: Pep Guardiola has apologised to new Premier League referee Farai Hallam if he "feels offended", having taken issue with the official following Manchester City's victory over Wolves on Saturday. But the Spaniard said he has to "defend my club and my players".
